messages.subject: A baby step
messages.msgSnippet: Can I share one baby step  in mindful parenting for me - start saying YES. Somehow the no habit has become a natural response - yuk! I made a big sign for
messages.messageBody:
Can I share one baby step in mindful parenting for me - start saying YES.
Somehow the "no" habit has become a natural response - yuk!

I made a big sign for myself on the kitchen wall today with YES written on it. I made several acrostics (sp?) of yes, branching out from the word
You'll Excell - Seriously
Your Example Shines
Yippiee Exciting Stuff
You'll Eliminate Sulking
You're Earning a Smile
etc.......

This led to a really great discussion about accrostics (spelling!?) and the kids making up funny ones of their names etc

I think I can, I think I can, I think i can..........
vanessa
